name: Mark L. HELPIN, Petitioner v. TRUSTEES OF the UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA, Marjorie Jeffcoat, Thomas Freitag, and Lawrence M. Levin, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Helpin v. Trustees of the University

parties: Mark L. HELPIN, Petitioner v. TRUSTEES OF the UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA, Marjorie Jeffcoat, Thomas Freitag, and Lawrence M. Levin, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of November, 2009, the Cross-Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, limited to the following question:
Did the trial court properly grant a nonsuit on Petitioner’s claim for tortious interference with prospective economic relations?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
984 A.2d 478
Mark L. HELPIN, Petitioner v. TRUSTEES OF the UNIVERSITY OF PENNSYLVANIA, Marjorie Jeffcoat, Thomas Freitag, and Lawrence M. Levin, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 13, 2009.
